_header: To unpraise women it were a shame
Subjects: women, praise of; carols, of women
_description: In praise of women — three quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘I am as lyght as any roe / To preyse wemen wher that I goo’

BLHar4294.First Lines:
To onpreyse wemen yt were a shameFor a woman was thy
                    dame…
BLHar4294.Last Lines:
…Ther to she puttythe all her myghtAnd yet she hathe bot care
                    and woo
